source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_00<tab>Ellie would share with you a shocking new turn in the phantom thief case.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_00<tab>ミスリルアイの記者エリーは、冒険者に怪盗白仮面事件の新情報を伝えたいようだ。

source:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_01<tab>Inspector's Log:
I daresay, that spell of physical exertion at the Coliseum served well to clear my mind. My inquisitive senses feel even more heightened than ever! Most auspicious timing, as it would seem the fiend I pursue has set his sights on his greatest prize yet, an act which I am bound by duty and honor to foil. The exact nature of this final Belah'dian relic eludes me for the moment, but for Hildibrand─agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire─inspiration is always but a stone's throw away!
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
The news Ellie shares with you is chilling indeed. Three prominent citizens of the sultanate have been murdered in cold blood, and evidence at the scene suggests that the thief of many faces is responsible. Meanwhile, the exact nature of the fourth and final relic that the thief is targeting remains unknown. At a loss for leads, Ellie proposes a visit to the sultanate's leading information-monger. Seek out Wymond on the Steps of Nald.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_01<tab>前回までの冒険録：
「コロセウムの秘宝を奪う」という予告を止めるべく、事件屋ヒルディブランドたちは奮闘したが、「怪盗白仮面」に「審理の指輪」を盗まれてしまった。怪盗白仮面からの新たな予告状によると、次の標的は「ウルダハの秘宝」。その秘宝によって、怪盗白仮面の手元に「4つの神器」が揃い、正義の裁きが下されるという。ヒルディブランドたちは、怪盗白仮面の「正義の裁き」を防ぐことができるのだろうか……？
　　　　　　　　　　　　*　*　*
エリーによると、怪盗白仮面が、ついに連続殺人をはじめたという。彼女はその対応に時間を割いていたため、「ウルダハの秘宝」について調べられなかったそうだ。「ウルダハの秘宝」について話を聞くため、ウルダハのサンシルク前に向かい、情報屋の「ワイモンド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_02<tab>Details on the phantom thief's movements are scarce, with Wymond able to offer only the knowledge that the Sultansworn have redoubled their efforts to keep the royal vaults safe from your quarry. He accompanies this with an ominous warning that this case may prove more dangerous than your previous forays. Ellie remains undaunted, and bids you accompany her to the Heart of the Sworn to seek further information from those in the know.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_02<tab>ワイモンドによると、「ウルダハの秘宝」の警備については、銀冑団が対策本部を立てているらしい。ウルダハのフロンデール歩廊で、怪盗白仮面の対策本部の関係者を探してみよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_03<tab>At your destination, you are reunited with none other than Humphrey, the erstwhile two-gil swindler who has since amended his ways and enlisted in the Sultansworn with dreams of serving the realm not unlike Hildibrand, whom he idolizes. In return for your efforts in introducing him to his newfound role model, he introduces you to Phillice, who is leading the investigation. She is being assisted by Consulting Inspector Briardien, who has devised an ingenious powder capable of dispelling the phantom thief's disguises, and Hildibrand, who is convinced he has something to offer the investigation as well. After a less-than-enlightening briefing from Phillice on the details of the murders, you prepare to take to the field. Consult with Hildibrand as to your next course of action.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_03<tab>銀冑団に入ったハンフリーが、対策本部の本部長であるフィリスを紹介してくれた。フィリスは冒険者たちに、連続殺人事件を止めるよう依頼してきた。捜査の手はずを確認するため、フロンデール歩廊の「ヒルディブランド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_04<tab>Hildibrand suggests that you begin your search at the Eighty Sins of Sasamo, where the most recent victim's body was discovered. Make your way to western Thanalan and rendezvous with the inspector.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_04<tab>ヒルディブランドは、歴史学者の殺害現場で調査を行いたいようだ。西ザナラーンのササモの八十階段にいる「ヒルディブランド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_05<tab>Your inspection of the crime scene turns up a scattering of flowers, soon revealed to be placed there by the victim's elderly mother in memory of her departed son. Seemingly driven half-mad in her grief, the old woman spins a chilling─if somewhat far-fetched─tale of living men turned to zombies by a vengeful specter wielding the powers of forbidden Sil'dihn alchemy. Doubtless Inspector Hildibrand has his own theories as to the plausibility of the woman's ramblings...
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_SEQ_05<tab>被害者の親族である老婆と会うことができた。老婆は、すべての事件はシラディハの亡霊の仕業に違いないという。ヒルディブランドはどう考えているのか、聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wymond near Sunsilk Tapestries.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_00<tab>サンシルク前のワイモンドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_01<tab>Seek out information at Scholars' Walk.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_01<tab>フロンデール歩廊で対策本部関係者を探す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Hildibrand.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_02<tab>ヒルディブランドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Hildibrand at the Eighty Sins of Sasamo.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_TODO_03<tab>ササモの八十階段のヒルディブランドと話す

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_000<tab>I was wondering when you'd show up, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I hope you haven't made any plans for the <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((night)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((night)) /var>)) /var>, because we've got a situation on our hands!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、大変よ！
「怪盗白仮面」の事件が……急展開を迎えたわ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_001<tab>Remember our good friend the phantom thief? Well, it seems he's decided to branch out from burglary to cold-blooded <var 1A 02 /var>murder<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_001<tab>ついに彼が殺人を……
いえ、連続殺人を起こしてしまったのよ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_002<tab>If the rumors are to be believed, he's claimed three victims already─all influential members of Ul'dahn society.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_002<tab>情報によれば、現在までの被害者は3人。
いずれも、各界の著名人ばかり……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_003<tab>Mister many-faces has been kind enough to leave one of his signature calling cards at every scene, leaving no doubt as to the identity of the murderer. The message is always the same: <var 1A 02 /var>The weight of five corpses will bring the scales of justice to balance.<var 1A 01 /var> More riddles...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_003<tab>殺人現場には、毎回「怪盗白仮面」からの、
メッセージカードが残されているようなの。
「白き秤は、5つの命の重さを求める」……ってね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_004<tab>
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_004<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_005<tab>...Not that you'll hear me complaining. No, the only thing my readers like more than a good mystery is a good <var 1A 02 /var>murder<var 1A 01 /var> mystery. Ever since the story broke, the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>'s been selling like ponzecakes!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_005<tab>この連続殺人事件を記事にした途端、
「ミスリルアイ」は売り切れ続出でね。
読者からの問い合わせ対応もあって、記者は大忙し。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_006<tab>The only rub is that it's left me no time to look into the thief's last message...until now, that is! Shall we, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_006<tab>だから、前回の予告状に書かれていた、
「ウルダハの秘宝」や「正義の裁き」を調べる時間がなくて……。
まずは、そこから取材にあたらないといけないわ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_007<tab>The hidden treasure of Ul'dah, was it? If there's anyone who can shed some light on this, it's you-know-who. To Sunsilk Tapestries!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_007<tab>ウルダハの噂話なら、情報屋の「ワイモンド」に聞くのが早いわ。
彼なら、いつもサンシルクの前にいるはずよ。
一緒に聞きにいきましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_030<tab>Well now, if it ain't my favorite 'venturer...and my favorite <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> reporter 'long with <var 08 E905 (('er)) (('im)) /var>. Tell me, what have I done to deserve the pleasure o' your company today?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_030<tab>よォ、今日はエリーと一緒なんだな。
彼女は俺のお得意さんでね、よくしてもらってるよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_031<tab>...I see. As much as I'd like to help <var 08 E905 ((two lovely ladies)) ((two o' my best mates)) /var>, I'm 'fraid you've found ol' Wymond at a loss. Ul'dah has more than its fair share o' treasures, hidden an' otherwise. I reckon our phantom friend could be after just about any of 'em.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_031<tab>話の察しはつくぜ、「ウルダハの秘宝」についてだろう？
だが、俺も大した情報はつかめてねぇってのが本音だ。
なんせ、ウルダハのお宝なんて、山ほどあるからな……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_032<tab>...I <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> tell you this much, though. Whatever the thief's got his eyes on, it's got the Sultansworn in a right dither. Word has it they've formed a regiment o' their best and brightest to safeguard the royal vaults from this very threat.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_032<tab>代わりに、ひとつ情報をやるよ。
ウルダハ宝物庫の警備を預かる「銀冑団」が、
「怪盗白仮面」の対策本部を立ち上げたらしいぜ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_033<tab>The Sultansworn aren't like to be forthcoming with information, but it's the only lead we've got. Come on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'd say it's time we paid a visit to the Heart of the Sworn.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_033<tab>対策本部……ね。
銀冑団総長室付近に行けば、関係者と話せるかもしれないわ。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、さっそく行ってみましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_034<tab>...Oi, hold up there, Ellie. I ain't generally the worryin' type, but you may want to think twice before gettin' yourselves involved in this.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_034<tab>……なぁ、エリー。
今回の事件は、ちょいとマズイ臭いがするぜ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_035<tab>A man in my business develops a nose for danger, and this time, the stench is somethin' fierce. You're a reporter, Ellie, and a fine one at that. Don't put that pretty neck o' yours at risk tryin' to play hero.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_035<tab>今までとは違う、危険な臭いだ。
お前はただの記者……あまり深入りするんじゃねぇぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_036<tab>Your concern is touching, but I can assure you that I am ready for whatever dangers lie ahead. Besides, being a reporter is about more than selling papers. I have a <var 1A 02 /var>duty<var 1A 01 /var> to seek out the truth and convey it to the people. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, time is of the essence.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_036<tab>私も、嫌な予感がしてるわ……いつもどおり、勘だけど。
それでも、私には人々に「真実」を伝える使命があるからね。
やれるかぎりはやってみるつもりよ、ご忠告ありがとう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_040<tab>Confidence...I like that in a woman. Anyroad, it's not my place to stop you, so just promise me you'll be careful. My gut tells me that trouble's a-brewin', and my gut's right more often than wrong.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_WYMOND_000_040<tab>……アンタも気をつけろよ。
今回の事件は、今までとは毛色が違う。
長年この仕事やってると、そういうのがわかるんだよ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_045<tab>Where have I seen this man before...?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_045<tab>こ、こいつって、もしかして……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_060<tab>Halt! Only authorized personnel are allowed in─
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_060<tab>ムッ、なんだお前ら。
関係者以外は立ち入り禁止だぞ！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_061<tab>Th-Thal bugger me with a broadsword! It's the Gentleman of Light's adventurin' companion and that catty-but-cute reporter from the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_061<tab>って、お前は……！
あの「光の紳士」のお供の冒険者！？
横のは……嫌味な記者の姉ちゃんか！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_062<tab>Well, well...if it isn't the self-styled Warrior of Light. Tell me, what tall tales did you spin to the Sultansworn recruiter to land yourself in this position?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_062<tab>ふん、久しぶりね、ニセ「光の戦士」さん。
まさか、貴方が銀冑団に入ってたなんて……驚きだわ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_063<tab>O-Only the Twelve's honest truth, miss! Seeing that Gentleman of Light standing tall and triumphant that day, it <var 1A 02 /var>moved<var 1A 01 /var> me─to the depths of me soul, like. I vowed to put aside my sketchy past and serve the realm just like my hero Master Hildibrand. The Sultansworn were impressed with my commitment and my sword arm, and they gladly welcomed me into their ranks.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_063<tab>ひ、「光の紳士」の働きに感銘を受けて、
俺も世のためにできることを探そうと思っただけだ……。
元々剣術は得意だったから、銀冑団の入団試験を受けたのさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_064<tab>Wait, don't tell me─you've come to assist Master Hildibrand in his investigation, haven't you? Cor, why didn't you say so sooner!? It's the least I could do to help the <var 08 E905 ((two ladies)) ((mates)) /var> who united me with my role model.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_064<tab>……そうだ、どうせ「怪盗白仮面」の事件について、
あの「光の紳士」と一緒に、捜査するつもりなんだろう！？
対策本部の本部長を呼んでやるから、待ってな！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_065<tab>You'll be wanting to speak with Phillice. She's one of the 'Sworn's best, and something of a history buff, it'd seem. When she heard the thief was targeting the four relics of Belah'dia, she personally stepped forward and volunteered to lead the investigation.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_065<tab>本部長は、歴史に詳しい才女なんだ。
ヤツが「ベラフディア四大神器」を集めてると聞いて、
今回の事件に強い興味を持ったらしい。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_066<tab>If anyone has the information you're looking for, it'd be her. Wait here while I get her─I can trust you not to touch anything, aye?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_066<tab>今回の本部長も、自ら志願したそうだからな。
彼女なら、「ウルダハの秘宝」も守りとおしてくれるはずさ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_100<tab>A pleasure to meet you, Phillice. My name is Ellie, from the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var>. As you may have heard, we're researching the phantom thief case, and would appreciate any information that may shed light on recent events.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_100<tab>あなたが「怪盗白仮面」対策本部の本部長さん？
私はミスリルアイの記者、エリーと申します。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_101<tab>The pleasure is mine, Miss Ellie. And if I'm not mistaken, that would make your companion friend here one <var 29 EB02 /var>, yes?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_101<tab>はい、銀冑団のフィリスと申します。
エリーさんがいらっしゃったということは……
おとなりの冒険者さんは、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_102<tab>You know <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_102<tab>あら、よくご存知ね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_103<tab>As any regular reader of the <var 1A 02 /var>Mythril Eye<var 1A 01 /var> would! I must confess to being something of an unabashed fan of your work.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_103<tab>はい、今回の対策を立てるにあたって、
エリーさんの「特集記事」を熟読しましたから！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_104<tab>Though it hardly befits my station to say this, I was secretly hoping that you would show up to assist in the investigation. Doubtless the inspector, too, will also welcome a helping hand...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_104<tab>これまで「怪盗白仮面」を追ってきた皆さんには、
今回の捜査にも、ぜひ参加していただきたいと思っていました！
実は、すでに事件屋さんには先行して依頼を……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_105<tab>The Sultansworn─the elite of Ul'dah's elite. I can only hope they prove more competent than the bungling mercenaries I've dealt with thus far.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_105<tab>さすがはウルダハ朝の王家に仕える、王宮近衛兵。
これまでの傭兵くずれとは、警備に対する姿勢が違う。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_106<tab>Inspector Briardien! Always one step ahead of us.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_106<tab>あら、ブリアルディアン君。
先に来ていたのね。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_107<tab>Miss Ellie. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. A moment, if you would.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_107<tab>やあ、エリー、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_108<tab>Right there, very good. Now face me, and don't move an ilm.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_108<tab>いきなり失礼だが……
君たちには、この「粉」をかぶってもらう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_109<tab>I-Inspector? What is that in your─ <cough> <wheeze>
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_109<tab>ええっ、ちょっ……な、なにこれ？
ケホッ！　ケホッ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_110<tab>...Demasking dust. A formula of my own devising that will allow us to see right through the thief's disguises.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_110<tab>……ふたりとも問題ないようだな、安心した。
これは「怪盗白仮面」の変装を解くために用意した、
「粉末ミラージュディスペラー」だ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_111<tab>Analyzing the mask left behind at Vesper Bay, I was able to identify its composition and synthesize a counteragent that would dissolve the disguise whilst leaving the wearer's face intact. In any event, it would appear the two of you are indeed who you appear to be.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_111<tab>銀冑団から、奴の変装対策について依頼があってね。
以前、ベスパーベイで手に入れた特殊マスクを分析し、
錬金術師ギルドの力を借りて作製したのさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_112<tab>Brilliant, Inspector! The phantom thief's pulled the wool over our eyes for the last time!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_112<tab>す、すごいじゃない！
これがあれば、「怪盗白仮面」の変装も怖くないわ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_113<tab>I fear it won't be so simple. The ingredients necessary to produce the dust are exceedingly rare. Even with the entire resources of the Sultansworn at our disposal, we were only able to produce a limited supply.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_113<tab>ですが、「粉」の作製には費用と時間がかかるため、
あまりお渡しすることはできません……。
恥ずかしながら、銀冑団は予算があまりないのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_114<tab>...I see. Well, I suppose it's better than nothing. That said, have you been able to identify the thief's next target? A hidden treasure of Ul'dah, the last of the four lost relics of Belah'dia...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_114<tab>それでも、十分な力になりそうよ。
……そうだ、「ウルダハの秘宝」は特定できた？
「ベラフディア四大神器」の最後のひとつ……って話だけど。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_115<tab>I fear not. I've pored through the histories time and again, but the only mention of these four relics is a vague reference in an old prophecy. Most serious scholars consider it little more than a faerie tale.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_115<tab>いえ、当時の書物を全て読み返しましたが、わかりません。
そもそも「ベラフディア四大神器」とは、
当時の絵巻物に登場する、おとぎ話上の物なのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_116<tab>“When darkness falls, and hope fades to despair, four warriors born of Light shall descend, in the righteous glare.”
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_116<tab>「黄昏の刻、絶望の淵に光輝あり。
　その者、奇跡を起こせし、ベラフディア『光の四戦士』なり」

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_100_116<tab>The legend goes on to describe four sacred artifacts─one each possessed by these four Belah'dian heroes─but makes no mention as to their appearance or nature.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_100_116<tab>「ベラフディア四大神器」とは、
この「光の四戦士」が持っていた神器とされていますが、
具体的な名称は、どこにも記録されていません……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_117<tab>Three times we have tried to identify the thief's target, and three times has he foiled us by making off with something else entirely. Needless speculation will only play to the fiend's strengths.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_117<tab>予想をするのも、もはや下策だろう。
コスタ・デル・ソルとコロセウムでの事件において、
「怪盗白仮面」は、こちらの予想とは異なる品を奪っている。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_118<tab>All artifacts of Belah'dian origin have been sealed within the royal vault, and a regiment of our finest assigned to its protection. I have furnished all the guards with a supply of demasking dust, and instructed them to be on the lookout for any suspicious personages.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_118<tab>ええ、ここの宝物庫には、ベラフディア縁の品が多くあります。
ですから、宝物庫の警備には一番の手練を配備し、
「粉末ミラージュディスペラー」を優先的に持たせました。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_GUIGUE_100_118<tab>The blackguard will be in chains before he can lay a dirty hand on the vault doors, let alone the treasures within. You have our word, my lady.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_GUIGUE_100_118<tab>警備は我々におまかせください！
宝物庫の中身は、すべて守ってみせますよ。
……それでは本部長、失礼します。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_119<tab>...But there are even more disturbing matters at hand. Doubtless you have heard of the recent rash of murders perpetrated by our quarry.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_119<tab>そのため、一方で、もうひとつの事件……。
「怪盗白仮面」の新たな犯行である、例の連続殺人事件まで、
手が回っていないのが現状なのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_120<tab>The Sultansworn have launched an investigation, but the truth of the matter is that we have been far too occupied with the defense of the vaults to make any meaningful progress. We would be most grateful for any assistance you could offer.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_120<tab>こちらについては、銅刃団が調査に入っていますが、
彼らだけでは捜査は難航することでしょう。
そこで、あなた方に調査をお願いしたいのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_121<tab>(-???-)A lady asks...and a gentleman answers!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_121<tab>(-？？？？-)フッフッフ……匂います……！
大事件の香りを……キャッチしましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_123<tab>Cast all worry from your heart, my lady. Hildibrand─agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire─has arrived to set right what is wrong and bring the wicked to justice.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_123<tab>お呼びにあずかりました、事件屋ヒルディブランド！
颯爽と参上いたしましたぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_124<tab>...And this must be the demasking dust that is the talk of the palace! Ah, but you need not waste your supply on me, Inspector. I assure you that I am exactly who I claim to be!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_124<tab>ゴホッゴホッ……ひ、ひどい！
これは噂に聞く「粉」ですかな！？
ゴホッ、私は「怪盗白仮面」ではございませんぞ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_125<tab>...A shame, that.
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_125<tab>チッ……本物か。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_127<tab>I-Inspector Hildibrand. We were not expecting you, but your services are most welcome. I will share all I know about the recent murders.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_127<tab>ヒ、ヒルディブランド様もいらっしゃったようですし、
連続殺人事件の現状についてご説明します。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_128<tab>The killer has claimed three victims thus far: the head of a publishing consortium, a high-ranking government official, and an influential scholar. Other than that they were all influential figures in their respective circles, we can identify no common threads connecting the three.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_128<tab>これまで3名となった被害者は、出版関係者と行政の官吏。
そして、史学研究者です。
彼らには、これといった共通点は見られません……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_130<tab>Oho! This will prove a most satisfying case to crack indeed! And what of the method of killing? Conked over the head with a cudgel? Gutted with a great sword? Strangled with a subligar, mayhap!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_130<tab>ふぅむ、なるほど……。
亡くなった方々の死因は、なんだったのでしょう？
刺殺ですか、絞殺ですか、それとも……！？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_131<tab>I-I'm afraid that we've identified no pattern. In any event, the murderer plots the deaths of two more even as we speak! We must take action, and quickly!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_131<tab>それは……毎回、異なっていて、こちらも共通点は……。
とにかく、予告されている残りの二名の殺人を、
どうか止めていただきたいのです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_132<tab>Understood, my lady! Clues may be scarce, but worry not─my realm-renowned powers of deduction are more than up to the task. I will see this burglar-turned-butcher delivered to justice!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_132<tab>……ふむ、あとは捜査の中で調べましょう。
この事件を最後に、凶悪殺人鬼と化した大悪党……
「怪盗白仮面」を、必ずや捕らえて見せますぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_133<tab>Your presence is heartening indeed, Inspector Hildibrand. Friends, please take this demasking dust with you. I fear we can spare but a single sachet, but I trust you will put it to good use.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_133<tab>頼もしいかぎりです。
念のため「粉末ミラージュディスペラー」をお渡ししますね。
1回分だけですので、慎重にお使いください。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_140<tab>He may have a thousand faces, but with Inspector Briardien's demasking dust, the masquerade will soon be over.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_140<tab>「粉末ミラージュディスペラー」があれば、
「怪盗白仮面」の変装も怖くないわね……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_145<tab>The Gentleman of Light, in the flesh! Hells, he's every bit as muscular and majestic as I remembered!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HUMPHREY_000_145<tab>また「光の紳士」に会えるとは……！
銀冑団に入ってよかったぜ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_150<tab>On behalf of the Sultansworn, your assistance with the murder investigation is greatly appreciated. Leave the defense of the royal vault to us.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_PHILLICE_000_150<tab>宝物庫の警備は、我々におまかせください。
連続殺人事件の方を、よろしくお願いいたします。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_200<tab>Come to accompany me on yet another case, friend? I like your gusto! But if you're auditioning to be my assistant, I fear that role has already been filled most ably.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_200<tab>フフフ……最後の事件までご一緒することになるとは、
冒険者殿、さすがは私のファン一号ですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_201<tab>Still, a gentleman welcomes the support of all of his admirers. I shall henceforth name you thusly: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, my ever-loyal associate!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_201<tab>いえ、改めてこう呼ばせてください……。
「運命の友 <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>」殿と！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_202<tab>And now, my ever-loyal associate, the investigation calls! I propose that we begin by inspecting the site at which the most recent victim met his demise.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_202<tab>さて、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿。
ひとまず、直前の被害者である史学研究者の、
殺害現場に向かってみましょう。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_203<tab>My questioning about the palace has revealed that the scholar's body was found not far from the Eighty Sins of Sasamo.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_203<tab>私が調べたところによると、
史学研究者は「ササモの八十階段」付近で、
殺害されていたようです。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_204<tab>Even the most circumspect of criminals cannot help but leave behind clues─clues that will not elude my gaze! Friends, let us be off!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_204<tab>まだ何か手がかりが残されているかもしれません。
さっそく、向かってみましょう！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_100_204<tab>Pray alert me should you see anyone suspicious, my ever-loyal associate. We must put Miss Phillice's demasking dust to good use!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_100_204<tab>なに、怪しい奴がいたら、
フィリス殿から預かった「粉末ミラージュディスペラー」で、
正体を見抜いてやりますとも！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_210<tab>Flowers. How intriguing...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_210<tab>この辺りが、事件現場のようだな……。
花が手向けられている。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_300<tab>Flowers...? Yes, it is all becoming clear now! Our phantom killer is a florist, who, in his hurry to escape, carelessly mislaid his wares!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_300<tab>ご覧ください、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿！
花が手向けられていますぞ！
私の推理によると、これはお花屋さんの落としも……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_301<tab>(-???-)Just what do ye think yer doing!? Eh!? Eh!?
target: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_301<tab>(-？？？？-)……お主らはぁ、ここで何をやっておるのかねぇ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_302<tab><var 1A 02 /var>I'm<var 1A 01 /var> the one what put those flowers there, eh!? To honor the memory o' me poor boy! Ye dare defile his memory, eh? Eh!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_302<tab>その花を手向けたのは、ワタシだぁよ……。
ここで死んだぁ、ワタシの息子のためにねぇ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_303<tab>A thousand pardons, my lady! Please accept my most sincere condolences on your loss. I am Hildibrand─agent of enquiry, inspector extraordinaire. I swear to you─on my own dear mother's name─that your son's killer will be brought to justice.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_303<tab>おお……やはり私の推理どおり、ご遺族の物でしたか！！
ご婦人、突然の不幸をお悔やみ申し上げますぞ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_304<tab>Ahem! As I was just saying, these flowers were clearly placed here by the family of the deceased, which can only mean...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_HILDIBRAND_000_304<tab>私は、事件屋ヒルディブランド。
現在「怪盗白仮面」による連続殺人を阻止するべく、
捜査を進めている素敵な紳士ですぞ！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_305<tab>L-Leave this place... Run away, while you still can... Run far, far away!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_305<tab>……捜査……ですってぇ……！？
アア……アア……なんて恐ろしい……！
そんなもの、そんなもの、今すぐやめなさい！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_100_305<tab>Run, or he'll turn you into a zombie. Just like my poor, poor boy!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_100_305<tab>アア……さもなければ……
お主らも「ゾンビー」にさせられてしまうよ！！
息子と……息子と同じようにねぇ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_306<tab>A living person turned into a zombie? Nonsense!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_BRIARDIEN_000_306<tab>生きている人が、ゾンビーに……？
そんな馬鹿なことがあるものですか。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_307<tab>Not nonsense, my boy...history! Or have you not heard of the horrors of Sil'dih? Aye, Ul'dah's sibling nation, against which we waged war centuries ago.
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_307<tab>……かつてザナラーン地方には、
「シラディハ」という、ウルダハの兄弟国家があってねぇ……。
約400年前、両国は大きな戦争をしたのさ。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_100_307<tab>Much blood was shed by both sides, aye. But I speak of far greater horrors than death. An unholy draught brewed by a Sil'dihn alchemist─one with the power to turn the living to the undead, that his nation might command an army of mindless, deathless soldiers. The Traders' Spurn!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_100_307<tab>その戦争で、シラディハの民は、ある薬を開発したのよぉ……。
それが、人をゾンビー化させる恐怖の秘薬……
「ゾンビパウダー」さ……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_308<tab>They turned my poor boy into a heap of rottin' flesh and ran him through. But ye won't hear that from the Sultansworn. Thal alone knows why, but they whisked the body away before I could so much as pay me last respects...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_308<tab>息子は「ゾンビパウダー」で自我を失い……処分された。
駆けつけた銅刃団は「異常な事件」だからと、情報を隠蔽……。
遺体も回収されちまったのさぁ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_309<tab>...The Traders' Spurn? I'd heard the stories, but I never thought them true! To be able to procure such a frightening thing─just who are we dealing with here!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELLIE_000_309<tab>「ゾンビパウダー」……。
そんなものを手に入れられる「怪盗白仮面」って、
いったい何者なのかしら？

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_310<tab>A Sil'dihn, I'm sure of it. Aye, only a Sil'dihn would know the recipe...
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_310<tab>シラディハの民……そうさ、そうにちがいない……。
彼らは「ゾンビパウダー」を作ることができるからねぇ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_311<tab>But the last remnants of Sil'dih died four centuries ago, you say!? Heeehaheahaeh! Oh, they did, they did! Heahehaheheeehah!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_311<tab>……けど、そんなことあり得りゃしないんだよ……ヒヒヒ……！
あの国は、400年前に滅んでいるんだからねぇ……ヒヒヒ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_100_311<tab>He calls himself the phantom thief, he does, but did it ever occur to ye that he might be an honest-to-gods <var 1A 02 /var>phantom<var 1A 01 /var>? Eh!? Eh!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_100_311<tab>ああ……きっと「怪盗白仮面」は「この世のもの」ではない……。
シラディハが生んだ、憎しみの亡霊に違いないのさ！！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_312<tab>Heard the tales from my own great-great-grandma, I did. About the four relics of Belah'dia, and the powers they hold. The power to exact justice!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_312<tab>ワタシは、祖母に聞いたことがある……！
「ベラフディア四大神器」には、
おそろしい威力の「大魔法」が秘められているってね！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_313<tab>A specter of Sil'dih has returned to wreak vengeance on us. Woe, woe unto us all! Have the four Warriors of Light forsaken us!?
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_313<tab>その魔法で、ウルダハに復讐をする気なんだ！
ああ、おそろしい……！　おそろしい……！
光の四戦士様……我々ウルダハの民をお守りください……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_314<tab>My dear boy! If only you'd become a trader like your father! If only you'd kept your nose out o' those history books, and never so much breathed the accursed name o' Sil'dih! But you did, and now we're doomed! Doomed! Doooooomed! AhaehaeHEHheahhahehaehHEaeh!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_OLD00490_000_314<tab>……私の息子も、シラディハの歴史なぞ調べなければ！
ああ、あの国の歴史には触れてはならぬ……！
これ以上詮索したら、端から呪い殺されてしまう……！

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELEAZAR_000_315<tab>(-???-)That bleedin' whoreson's here somewhere... I can feel it in me follicles!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELEAZAR_000_315<tab>(-？？？？-)はぁ、はぁ……。
どこじゃ……奴は、どこにいるんじゃ……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELEAZAR_000_316<tab>The most potent hair tonic the realm has seen? Aye, that it was─for all of a fortnight, afore my flowin' locks fell out all over again. And just as I was chattin' up a lovely young lass at the Quicksand, just to twist the knife an extra ilm!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELEAZAR_000_316<tab>あの少女が持ってきた「モサモサトニック」のおかげで、
青春時代ほどの毛髪を手に入れたはいいが、
あっというまに効果がきれてもうた……。

source: TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELEAZAR_000_317<tab>Mountebank! Charlatan! I'll find that so-called inspector and his sorry band, and pull every last strand o' hair from their bleedin' skulls!
target:
TEXT_CHRHDB501_00490_ELEAZAR_000_317<tab>ああ、ワシの青春……モサモサトニックはどこじゃ……！
あの「事件屋」とかいう連中を、ひっ捕まえて、
何としてでも吐き出させなければ……！！
